law.catch_line: Personal property subject to assessment shall be assessed annually....

text.section: Personal property subject to assessment shall be assessed annually.

The assessment of personal property for the date of finality is based on:
information required to be included in the report to be filed under § 11-101 of this article by April 15 following the date of finality; or
if a report is not filed or is incomplete, any available information that the Department has.
